body: I believe this is very true to the characters if we ever saw their private life which I very much appreciate. though I kinda wanna see someone make Rito a harem king already maybe starting his own family with a few of the girls. in a story were the girls make the rules and all agree to be with Rito than to be with anyone else. I'm surprised that no one has taken harem king  idea and ran with it
Pretending to be learning? This is just plain vanilia sex, and this author doesent really draw anything other than that so what did you expect?

Boring, the same mechanical plunging in and out of a penis. You can watch the video of a regular engine in any place, pretending to be learning. At least Rito stops his stupid yelling and terror of sex. In Mezase! Rakuen Keikaku Vol.1(To LOVE-Ru) Rito does the full work and the sex scenes are way beyond the mediocre porn everywhere.
